title: Unstoppable
description: Rosie has managed to wangle spending the summer before uni in the same house as her boyfriend Cal â€“ but who else should also be staying except for the infamous man-eater, Cleo.Things between Cal and Rosie could never have been described as easy, but her growing jealousy seems like an unstoppable force. Can their love weather the storm?
author: Liz Bankes
